home.Avatar Description: Over 140K cool avatars are available to play in the Zomfi. Check out the collections and turn your NFT into life
home.Land Owner Desription: A Land is a piece of the Zomfies metaverse, providing access to exclusive content as well as granting the possibility to monetize your own part of The Zomfie’s Metaverse. Build experiences, host events, invite friends.
home.Dog NFT Description: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable — allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets
home.ZOMFI Description: Zomfie is our main utility token that allows you to buy and sell LANDS and ASSETS in the Zomfi metaverse.
home.ZED Description: Zed is our in-game token that allows you to buy and sell LANDS and ASSETS in the Zomfi metaverse.

play.Dog Mint SubTitle: Choose a dog to accompany you. Dog NFTs ownable are shown below.
play.Land Mint SubTitle: Choose a land to accompany you. Land NFTs ownable are shown below.
play.Mint Description: Mint Legend NFT to get a chance to mint Mythical by 0.01%.

cart.Title: Shopping cart
cart.Description: *The price and availability of items in Zomfi are subject to change. The Cart is a temporary place to store a list of your items and reflectd each item’s most recent price.
cart.No Cart Item: Add items to your cart and start buying!
cart.Confirm Delete: Are you sure you want to delete?

marketplace.Description: Discover Collections, get Equipment, or find assets to build your own unique Experiences.

community.Community SubTitle: Be part of our amazing community and stay tuned for any news.
